description: {"blocks":[{"key":"724n0","text":"Proteolytic enzymes are widely used in cell dissociation and papain  has proved less damaging with some tissues and neuronal cultures and more effective than other proteases. Here we describe a papain dissociation protocol that has been used on our iPSC-derived neurons for scRNAseq and FACS assays redouts.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: NIH Center for Alzheimer's and Related Dementias

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c3s13","text":"Equilibrate EBSS/phenol red with 95%O2:5%CO2 in incubator for several hours of overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28},{"style":"sub","offset":37,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":43,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b6pj8","text":"Reconstitute the Ovomucoid mixture (Papain inhibitor-PI) by adding   of EBSS and allow contents to dissolve. This will yield solution at an effective concentration of 10mg of ovomucoid inhibitor and 10mg of albumin per mL. Reconstitute for the first use, then store   at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35},{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":16},{"style":"bold","offset":53,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":266,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":271,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8kjma","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"32","error":false,"guid":"BC020CE092AA11ED8A94795DAACFFCBD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"051BE31092AB11ED8A94795DAACFFCBD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0B51652092AB11ED8A94795DAACFFCBD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7d1q8","text":"Papain solution: Add   of TrypLE™ Express Enzyme (1X), no phenol red to the vial and place it in    bath for 10 minutes, this vial has 10 units/ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bl514","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"enjl6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"artf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"67EAEEF0C1B311ED82D6F186BFEC8C14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BCE6C320C1B311ED82D6F186BFEC8C14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":104,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"7chbf","text":"When working with i3Neurons (WTC11 line), dissolve the papain with 20 mL of TrypLE™ Express Enzyme (1X).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7t07c","text":"DNase I  vial D2: Add 500ul of EBSS media and mix gently (2000 units/ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45ber","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gisa","text":"Trituration Medium:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hrb","text":"  of Neuronal Maturation medium (the same medium used for your differentiation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b8ii","text":"  of Rock inhibitor (1x)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cb8t2","text":"1 vial of DNase I","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"502be","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41q6o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"A01CF1D0C1BB11ED82D6F186BFEC8C14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"BFCBE810C1BB11ED82D6F186BFEC8C14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4j16h","text":"Papain Inhibitor media:   of Trituration medium +   of papain inhibitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"336h2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"1254C070C1BC11ED82D6F186BFEC8C14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"2E3F5BB0C1BC11ED82D6F186BFEC8C14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Dissociation protocol for iNeurons at day 28 of differentiation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ffj6","text":"Aspirate culture medium and wash gently with PBS (calcium/magnesium free).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Dissociation protocol for iNeurons at day 28 of differentiation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"54je4","text":"Aspirate PBS and wash 2 times with PBS-0.5mM EDTA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Dissociation protocol for iNeurons at day 28 of differentiation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8k17j","text":"Aspirate PBS-EDTA and add to one well of 6 well plate    of Papain solution (10 units/ml) to cells, and incubate at   for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":116,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":122,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dn3i0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dqj0","text":" time can vary and go up to 30 minutes and it depends on cell line, confluency and maturation day.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":39,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"4v3k5","text":"Incubation times for i3Neurons steps.section: Dissociation protocol for iNeurons at day 28 of differentiation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a478","text":"Aspirate papain solution when the cell bodies have an halo morphology like for and EDTA split. If the incubation is longer (up to 30 minutes) the cells will detach into papain solution, then continue with the next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Dissociation protocol for iNeurons at day 28 of differentiation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1red5","text":"Add   of trituration medium per well of a 6-well plate to dissociate cells and pipette medium over the plate up and down to detach cells and dissociate them as single-cell suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1vna9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"33D2C160C4DD11ED889B6D19B975F940","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Dissociation protocol for iNeurons at day 28 of differentiation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"725l9","text":"Collect cells into a sterile conical 15 mL tube and adjust volume to 5 mL with PBS or trituration medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Dissociation protocol for iNeurons at day 28 of differentiation
Dissociation protocol for iNeurons at day 28 of differentiation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8dub1","text":"Remove supernatant and resuspend the cell pellet gently with   of Papain inhibitor medium to wash off the papain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8v5vu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"65D0A920C4E211ED889B6D19B975F940","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
